categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Laksh'atz was a senior Jedi Padawan enrolled in the Jedi Order's academy on Coruscant.

A Padawan of the Jedi Order, Laksh'atz was selected by a Jedi Master before the Clone Wars. Soon after the Battle of Kothlis, Laksh'atz joined fellow Padawan Ahsoka Tano as part of Green Team in a competition arranged by Master Taria Damsin. The competition, taking place in the new Sublevel Nineteen Training Dojo, ended in a tie. Laksh'atz was the first to fall in the competition after falling in the quake-ground field. Greatly disappointed, Laksh'atz quickly exited the dojo to wait for the competition to end.
